forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 21C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 70F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 64F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
